title: Sion login theme
body: Does anyone know a link to the song? Also, does Riot make their own songs for things such as the Login Screen?

replies.body:
At some point it will make its way onto the LoL [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends) page.

And yes, we do have a small crew of composers that are always hard at work creating the awesome musics!!
